title: Using the saveLessonEntry API
context: The user wanted to see an example of calling the api.agrov.us plugin to save a lesson entry.
keyIdea: You can use the api.agrov.us__jit_plugin.saveLessonEntry operation to record structured lesson data into the agrov.us API, providing metadata such as title, date, context, and commands.
commands: api_agrov_us__jit_plugin.saveLessonEntry({ title: 'Example', date: 'YYYY-MM-DD', context: 'Description of user goal', category: 'Category', keyIdea: 'Insight summary', commands: 'Code or commands used', explanation: 'Explanation of process', reusabilityNotes: { whenToReuse: 'When similar task appears', pitfalls: 'Avoid missing fields' }, uniquenessTag: 'Uniqueness: New' })
explanation: This operation saves a learning entry with all relevant metadata into the agrov.us system.

reusabilityNotes.whenToReuse: Use when documenting a Linux or development task for future learning or automation.
reusabilityNotes.pitfalls: Ensure date and category fields are valid and formatted correctly.
